attributes.long-description:
Carnivores: Dinosaur Hunter is a hunting game, which lets players explore huge non-linear locations as they attempt to track down a variety of dinosaurs that are armed with advanced AI: these are dangerous creatures that are able to see, hear and sense the hunter. With 16 different dinosaurs across 6 distinct environments including pine forests, muddy marshes and rolling hills.
This version comes with new herbivore dinosaur and snowless map from Ice Age game.

Carnivores: Ice Age throws you onto a recently discovered planet to test your hunting tactical skills on a realistic ice safari. The hunter, equipped with weapons and all sorts of hunting accessories, needs to be quiet when approaching beast not to end up as an animal's dinner. Pack your equipment and start hunting 10 prehistoric creatures as you are ready to explore the new huge icy world.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems and 3 PSP™ systems activated by this account.
